qas.question: What county did the city of Southampton become administratively independent of in April of 1997?
What official designation did Southampton receive in the April 1997 local government reorganization?
What act was responsible for the reorganization of local government on April 1, 1997?
What ceremonial county does Southampton still belong to?

context: The city has undergone many changes to its governance over the centuries and once again became administratively independent from <a0_0>Hampshire County<a0_0/> as it was made into a <a1_0>unitary authority<a1_0/> in a local government reorganisation on 1 April 1997, a result of the <a2_0>1992 Local Government Act<a2_0/>. The district remains part of the <a3_0>Hampshire<a3_0/> ceremonial county.
